testsuite.name: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: When I open the Search User page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: Then I check if user "sam" exists, if not, I create the user
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: Then I am on the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: When I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: And I navigate to the "Class Grades" in "Gradebook" of current class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Grades page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: And I select "Improvised A1 - Homework/Quiz" in "Assignments" selection list
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: And I put "sam" in the "User" input box
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: And I click the date-from box
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: And I select next year on the calendar
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: And I click the Search button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: Then I assert that the grade is "-" for the selected assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: When I click the grade for the selected assignment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: Then I am on the Class Grades page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: And I see an error message stating that a test record already exists
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Filter gradebook search by date range outside of user's record, and verify that clicking on the empty grade displays an error
